summary: Completed comprehensive testing of new Turkish customer visit tracking features. All new backend endpoints and frontend functionality working correctly including visit status, payment collection, customer requests, and daily notes.

design_issues.issue: Missing Description or aria-describedby for DialogContent accessibility
design_issues.note: Console warning only, functionality works correctly

passed_tests: Backend API - All 15 endpoints tested successfully
Visit model new fields (visit_skip_reason, payment_collected, payment_skip_reason, payment_type, payment_amount, customer_request)
Visit skip reason dropdown with Turkish options
Payment type dropdown (Nakit, Kredi Kartı, etc.)
Payment skip reason dropdown with Turkish options
Save button functionality with backend integration
Daily note dialog opening and closing
Daily note textarea input and saving
Navigation back to today page after save
Progress bar showing correct visit counts (3/3)
